title: STAT545: Fall 2025
text: Welcome to STAT 545 at the University of British Columbia!

title: Syllabus
text:
Acknowledgement
UBC’s Point Grey Campus is located on the traditional, ancestral, and unceded territory of the xwməθkwəyəm (Musqueam) people. The land it is situated on has always been a place of learning for the Musqueam people, who for millennia have passed on their culture, history, and traditions from one generation to the next on this site.


Course Information



Course Title
Course Code Number
Credit Value


Exploratory Data Analysis Part I
STAT 545A
1.5


Exploratory Data Analysis
STAT 545B
1.5





Prerequisites
While there are no formal pre-requisites for STAT 545A, students should be familiar with basic statistical analyses and have taken at least one introductory statistics course.
STAT545A is a pre-requisite for STAT545B. No exceptions.


Contact and Office Hours



Instructor

grace@stat.ubc.ca

Teaching Assistants

TBD

Course Structure
This course will feature short lectures and in-class demonstrations so students get hands-on experience with the help of their instructor and TAs. The class will be partially “flipped”, with students being expected to review a short video prior to the lecture. Dedicated time will be given in lecture for students to work through assigned worksheets.
